name: All Cats Land On Their Feet
name_original: All Cats Land On Their Feet
description:
All cats land on their feet. But this cat? This cat land where its feet are pointed. 

In this game, you play as a cat who can flip gravity. With this abnormality, you use it to collect various items, like rats and cheese. Use W A S D or the arrow keys to move, spacebar to jump, and E to flip gravity. 

At the time of upload, the pause menu doesn't work, some of the collisions break sometimes, and there are currently no animations for the cat.
